title: František Pavúk
text:
František Pavúk (born 21 July 1993) is a <a href="Slovakia">Slovak</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> defender who currently plays for <a href="MFK%20Tatran%20Liptovsk%C3%BD%20Mikul%C3%A1%C5%A1">Liptovský Mikuláš</a>.
MFK Košice.
He made his debut for <a href="MFK%20Ko%C5%A1ice">MFK Košice</a> against <a href="Spartak%20Myjava">Spartak Myjava</a> on 22 September 2012.
